title: Part 2: Beyond the Fear Body (2015-06-10)
description:
Part 2: Beyond the Fear Body (2015-06-10) - A central part of spiritual awakening is recognizing and befriending fear, and in the tender intensity of fear, discovering the awakened heart.  In these two talks we explore the suffering of becoming identified with the fear body, and the skillful means that enable a full and liberating presence with fear.

Please support this podcast by donating at www.tarabrach.com. Your donations allow us to continue to freely offer the teachings!
